roleset.name: to associate, be in agreement
roleset.note: CONSORT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'consort' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from consort.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: person whose behavior we care about

example.name: both arguments
example.text: [*-1] Back in Berkeley , he-1 was violently scolded [*-1]-2 by a left-wing lady friend for [*-2] consorting with such people .
